string-array.name: avoid_array
string-array.item: Unpasteurised cheese (brie, camembert, soft blue cheeses)
Pâté which is not cooked or contains liver or fish
Raw or partially cooked eggs (homemade Mayonasie)
Raw or undercooked meat(Steak tartare, rare/medium steak)
Liver such as liver or haggis
Limit your fish intake to twice a week
Game that has been shot with lead pellets. Ask your butcher for more information

string-array.name: drink_array
string-array.item: Current guidelines advise to drink to alcohol during your pregnancy.
Limit your caffeine intake to under 200mg (two cups of strong coffee a day)

string-array.name: advice_array
string-array.item: If you have any questions read your Ready, Steady, Baby book or ask your midwife
